changeSet.sql: WITH userRow AS ( INSERT INTO ORGANIZATIONENTITY (ORG_ENTITY_ID) VALUES (nextval('HIBERNATE_SEQUENCE')) RETURNING ORG_ENTITY_ID ) INSERT INTO EDOCUSER ( ORG_ENTITY_ID, EMAIL, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, TITLE, USERNAME, ORGANIZATION_ID, OU_ORG_ENTITY_ID, CUSTOM_TITLE_TEMPLATE, PHONE, FAX, MOBILE ) VALUES ( (select ORG_ENTITY_ID from userRow), 'florin.danescu@arb.ro', 'Florin', 'Danescu', 'Presedinte Executiv', 'florin.danescu', null, (select ORG_ENTITY_ID from ORGANIZATIONUNIT where NAME='Presedinte Executiv'), null, '0213212078', '0213212095', null ); WITH userRow AS ( INSERT INTO ORGANIZATIONENTITY (ORG_ENTITY_ID) VALUES (nextval('HIBERNATE_SEQUENCE')) RETURNING ORG_ENTITY_ID ) INSERT INTO EDOCUSER ( ORG_ENTITY_ID, EMAIL, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, TITLE, USERNAME, ORGANIZATION_ID, OU_ORG_ENTITY_ID, CUSTOM_TITLE_TEMPLATE, PHONE, FAX, MOBILE ) VALUES ( (select ORG_ENTITY_ID from userRow), 'rodica.tuchila@arb.ro', 'Rodica', 'Tuchila', 'Director Executiv', 'rodica.tuchila', null, (select ORG_ENTITY_ID from ORGANIZATIONUNIT where NAME='Director Executiv Operatiuni Plati(DEOP)'), null, '0213212078', '0213212095', '0721243031' ); changeSet.author: CloudSoft.User1
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO GROUP_USER ( GROUP_ID, USER_ID ) SELECT (select ORG_ENTITY_ID from EDOCGROUP where NAME = 'All'), ORG_ENTITY_ID FROM EDOCUSER WHERE USERNAME != 'application.user'; INSERT INTO GROUP_USER ( GROUP_ID, USER_ID ) SELECT (select ORG_ENTITY_ID from EDOCGROUP where NAME = 'Admin'), ORG_ENTITY_ID FROM EDOCUSER WHERE USERNAME = 'vlad.barabas'; INSERT INTO GROUP_USER ( GROUP_ID, USER_ID ) SELECT (select ORG_ENTITY_ID from EDOCGROUP where NAME = 'Directori'), ORG_ENTITY_ID FROM EDOCUSER WHERE USERNAME IN ('rodica.tuchila', 'cati.ursu', 'gabriela.folcut'); INSERT INTO GROUP_USER ( GROUP_ID, USER_ID ) SELECT (select ORG_ENTITY_ID from EDOCGROUP where NAME = 'Director DEOP'), ORG_ENTITY_ID FROM EDOCUSER WHERE USERNAME IN ('rodica.tuchila'); INSERT INTO GROUP_USER ( GROUP_ID, USER_ID ) SELECT (select ORG_ENTITY_ID from EDOCGROUP where NAME = 'Director DEIC'), ORG_ENTITY_ID FROM EDOCUSER WHERE USERNAME IN ('gabriela.folcut'); INSERT INTO GROUP_USER ( GROUP_ID, USER_ID ) SELECT (select ORG_ENTITY_ID from EDOCGROUP where NAME = 'Consilieri Financiari Bancari(DAS)'), ORG_ENTITY_ID FROM EDOCUSER WHERE USERNAME IN ('rodica.tuchila', 'constantin.rotaru', 'tatiana.grafcenco', 'cristina.dumitrescu', 'luminita.soitu', 'stefan.dina'); INSERT INTO GROUP_USER ( GROUP_ID, USER_ID ) SELECT (select ORG_ENTITY_ID from EDOCGROUP where NAME = 'Responsabili proiect activitate'), ORG_ENTITY_ID FROM EDOCUSER WHERE USERNAME IN ('rodica.tuchila','cati.ursu','gabriela.folcut','luminita.malanciuc','constantin.rotaru','tatiana.grafcenco','cristina.dumitrescu','luminita.soitu','bogdan.martimof','stefan.dina','florin.ninu','adriana.tudor','andreea.rosu','sorina.sirbu', 'vlad.barabas');

changeSet.author: CloudSoft.User1
CloudSoft.User1
changeSet.sql: update edocuser set email = 'activitiorga@gmail.com' where username != 'application.user';
